00099 DdNode *
00100 Cudd_addExistAbstract(
00101   DdManager * manager,
00102   DdNode * f,
00103   DdNode * cube)
00104 {
00105     DdNode *res;
00106 
00107     two = cuddUniqueConst(manager,(CUDD_VALUE_TYPE) 2);
00108     if (two == NULL) return(NULL);
00109     cuddRef(two);
00110 
00111     if (addCheckPositiveCube(manager, cube) == 0) {
00112         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: Can only abstract cubes");
00113         return(NULL);
00114     }
00115 
00116     do {
00117         manager->reordered = 0;
00118         res = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(manager, f, cube);
00119     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00120 
00121     if (res == NULL) {
00122         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,two);
00123         return(NULL);
00124     }
00125     cuddRef(res);
00126     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,two);
00127     cuddDeref(res);
00128 
00129     return(res);
00130 
00131 } /* end of Cudd_addExistAbstract */

00148 DdNode *
00149 Cudd_addUnivAbstract(
00150   DdManager * manager,
00151   DdNode * f,
00152   DdNode * cube)
00153 {
00154     DdNode              *res;
00155 
00156     if (addCheckPositiveCube(manager, cube) == 0) {
00157         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error:  Can only abstract cubes");
00158         return(NULL);
00159     }
00160 
00161     do {
00162         manager->reordered = 0;
00163         res = cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(manager, f, cube);
00164     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00165 
00166     return(res);
00167 
00168 } /* end of Cudd_addUnivAbstract */

00186 DdNode *
00187 Cudd_addOrAbstract(
00188   DdManager * manager,
00189   DdNode * f,
00190   DdNode * cube)
00191 {
00192     DdNode *res;
00193 
00194     if (addCheckPositiveCube(manager, cube) == 0) {
00195         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Error: Can only abstract cubes");
00196         return(NULL);
00197     }
00198 
00199     do {
00200         manager->reordered = 0;
00201         res = cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(manager, f, cube);
00202     } while (manager->reordered == 1);
00203     return(res);

00226 DdNode *
00227 cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(
00228   DdManager * manager,
00229   DdNode * f,
00230   DdNode * cube)
00231 {
00232     DdNode      *T, *E, *res, *res1, *res2, *zero;
00233 
00234     zero = DD_ZERO(manager);
00235 
00236     /* Cube is guaranteed to be a cube at this point. */        
00237     if (f == zero || cuddIsConstant(cube)) {  
00238         return(f);
00239     }
00240 
00241     /* Abstract a variable that does not appear in f => multiply by 2. */
00242     if (cuddI(manager,f->index) > cuddI(manager,cube->index)) {
00243         res1 = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(manager, f, cuddT(cube));
00244         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00245         cuddRef(res1);
00246         /* Use the "internal" procedure to be alerted in case of
00247         ** dynamic reordering. If dynamic reordering occurs, we
00248         ** have to abort the entire abstraction.
00249         */
00250         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(manager,Cudd_addTimes,res1,two);
00251         if (res == NULL) {
00252             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00253             return(NULL);
00254         }
00255         cuddRef(res);
00256         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00257         cuddDeref(res);
00258         return(res);
00259     }
00260 
00261     if ((res = cuddCacheLookup2(manager, Cudd_addExistAbstract, f, cube)) != NULL) {
00262         return(res);
00263     }
00264 
00265     T = cuddT(f);
00266     E = cuddE(f);
00267 
00268     /* If the two indices are the same, so are their levels. */
00269     if (f->index == cube->index) {
00270         res1 = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(manager, T, cuddT(cube));
00271         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00272         cuddRef(res1);
00273         res2 = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(manager, E, cuddT(cube));
00274         if (res2 == NULL) {
00275             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00276             return(NULL);
00277         }
00278         cuddRef(res2);
00279         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(manager, Cudd_addPlus, res1, res2);
00280         if (res == NULL) {
00281             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00282             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00283             return(NULL);
00284         }
00285         cuddRef(res);
00286         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00287         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00288         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_addExistAbstract, f, cube, res);
00289         cuddDeref(res);
00290         return(res);
00291     } else { /* if (cuddI(manager,f->index) < cuddI(manager,cube->index)) */
00292         res1 = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(manager, T, cube);
00293         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00294         cuddRef(res1);
00295         res2 = cuddAddExistAbstractRecur(manager, E, cube);
00296         if (res2 == NULL) {
00297             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00298             return(NULL);
00299         }
00300         cuddRef(res2);
00301         res = cuddUniqueInter(manager, (int) f->index, res1, res2);
00302         if (res == NULL) {
00303             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00304             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00305             return(NULL);
00306         }
00307         cuddDeref(res1);
00308         cuddDeref(res2);
00309         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_addExistAbstract, f, cube, res);
00310         return(res);
00311     }       
00312 
00313 } /* end of cuddAddExistAbstractRecur */

00329 DdNode *
00330 cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(
00331   DdManager * manager,
00332   DdNode * f,
00333   DdNode * cube)
00334 {
00335     DdNode      *T, *E, *res, *res1, *res2, *one, *zero;
00336 
00337     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00338     zero = DD_ZERO(manager);
00339 
00340     /* Cube is guaranteed to be a cube at this point.
00341     ** zero and one are the only constatnts c such that c*c=c.
00342     */
00343     if (f == zero || f == one || cube == one) {  
00344         return(f);
00345     }
00346 
00347     /* Abstract a variable that does not appear in f. */
00348     if (cuddI(manager,f->index) > cuddI(manager,cube->index)) {
00349         res1 = cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(manager, f, cuddT(cube));
00350         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00351         cuddRef(res1);
00352         /* Use the "internal" procedure to be alerted in case of
00353         ** dynamic reordering. If dynamic reordering occurs, we
00354         ** have to abort the entire abstraction.
00355         */
00356         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(manager, Cudd_addTimes, res1, res1);
00357         if (res == NULL) {
00358             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00359             return(NULL);
00360         }
00361         cuddRef(res);
00362         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00363         cuddDeref(res);
00364         return(res);
00365     }
00366 
00367     if ((res = cuddCacheLookup2(manager, Cudd_addUnivAbstract, f, cube)) != NULL) {
00368         return(res);
00369     }
00370 
00371     T = cuddT(f);
00372     E = cuddE(f);
00373 
00374     /* If the two indices are the same, so are their levels. */
00375     if (f->index == cube->index) {
00376         res1 = cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(manager, T, cuddT(cube));
00377         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00378         cuddRef(res1);
00379         res2 = cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(manager, E, cuddT(cube));
00380         if (res2 == NULL) {
00381             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00382             return(NULL);
00383         }
00384         cuddRef(res2);
00385         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(manager, Cudd_addTimes, res1, res2);
00386         if (res == NULL) {
00387             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00388             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00389             return(NULL);
00390         }
00391         cuddRef(res);
00392         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00393         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00394         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_addUnivAbstract, f, cube, res);
00395         cuddDeref(res);
00396         return(res);
00397     } else { /* if (cuddI(manager,f->index) < cuddI(manager,cube->index)) */
00398         res1 = cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(manager, T, cube);
00399         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00400         cuddRef(res1);
00401         res2 = cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur(manager, E, cube);
00402         if (res2 == NULL) {
00403             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00404             return(NULL);
00405         }
00406         cuddRef(res2);
00407         res = cuddUniqueInter(manager, (int) f->index, res1, res2);
00408         if (res == NULL) {
00409             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00410             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00411             return(NULL);
00412         }
00413         cuddDeref(res1);
00414         cuddDeref(res2);
00415         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_addUnivAbstract, f, cube, res);
00416         return(res);
00417     }
00418 
00419 } /* end of cuddAddUnivAbstractRecur */

00435 DdNode *
00436 cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(
00437   DdManager * manager,
00438   DdNode * f,
00439   DdNode * cube)
00440 {
00441     DdNode      *T, *E, *res, *res1, *res2, *one;
00442 
00443     one = DD_ONE(manager);
00444 
00445     /* Cube is guaranteed to be a cube at this point. */
00446     if (cuddIsConstant(f) || cube == one) {  
00447         return(f);
00448     }
00449 
00450     /* Abstract a variable that does not appear in f. */
00451     if (cuddI(manager,f->index) > cuddI(manager,cube->index)) {
00452         res1 = cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(manager, f, cuddT(cube));
00453         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00454         cuddRef(res1);
00455         /* Use the "internal" procedure to be alerted in case of
00456         ** dynamic reordering. If dynamic reordering occurs, we
00457         ** have to abort the entire abstraction.
00458         */
00459         res = cuddAddApplyRecur(manager, Cudd_addOr, res1, res1);
00460         if (res == NULL) {
00461             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00462             return(NULL);
00463         }
00464         cuddRef(res);
00465         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00466         cuddDeref(res);
00467         return(res);
00468     }
00469 
00470     if ((res = cuddCacheLookup2(manager, Cudd_addOrAbstract, f, cube)) != NULL) {
00471         return(res);
00472     }
00473 
00474     T = cuddT(f);
00475     E = cuddE(f);
00476 
00477     /* If the two indices are the same, so are their levels. */
00478     if (f->index == cube->index) {
00479         res1 = cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(manager, T, cuddT(cube));
00480         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00481         cuddRef(res1);
00482         if (res1 != one) {
00483             res2 = cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(manager, E, cuddT(cube));
00484             if (res2 == NULL) {
00485                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00486                 return(NULL);
00487             }
00488             cuddRef(res2);
00489             res = cuddAddApplyRecur(manager, Cudd_addOr, res1, res2);
00490             if (res == NULL) {
00491                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00492                 Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00493                 return(NULL);
00494             }
00495             cuddRef(res);
00496             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00497             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00498         } else {
00499             res = res1;
00500         }
00501         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_addOrAbstract, f, cube, res);
00502         cuddDeref(res);
00503         return(res);
00504     } else { /* if (cuddI(manager,f->index) < cuddI(manager,cube->index)) */
00505         res1 = cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(manager, T, cube);
00506         if (res1 == NULL) return(NULL);
00507         cuddRef(res1);
00508         res2 = cuddAddOrAbstractRecur(manager, E, cube);
00509         if (res2 == NULL) {
00510             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00511             return(NULL);
00512         }
00513         cuddRef(res2);
00514         res = cuddUniqueInter(manager, (int) f->index, res1, res2);
00515         if (res == NULL) {
00516             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res1);
00517             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(manager,res2);
00518             return(NULL);
00519         }
00520         cuddDeref(res1);
00521         cuddDeref(res2);
00522         cuddCacheInsert2(manager, Cudd_addOrAbstract, f, cube, res);
00523         return(res);
00524     }
00525 
00526 } /* end of cuddAddOrAbstractRecur */

00534 
00548 static int
00549 addCheckPositiveCube(
00550   DdManager * manager,
00551   DdNode * cube)
00552 {
00553     if (Cudd_IsComplement(cube)) return(0);
00554     if (cube == DD_ONE(manager)) return(1);
00555     if (cuddIsConstant(cube)) return(0);
00556     if (cuddE(cube) == DD_ZERO(manager)) {
00557         return(addCheckPositiveCube(manager, cuddT(cube)));
00558     }
00559     return(0);
00560 
00561 } /* end of addCheckPositiveCube */
